item.title: Dual N-Back Training Game
item.description:
How to Play Dual N-Back

Dual N-Back is one of the most scientifically validated working memory training tasks. You need to track two streams of information simultaneously and decide whether the current stimulus matches the one presented N steps ago.

  1. Visual Channel – A blue square appears in one of 8 positions on a 3×3 grid.
  2. Auditory Channel – A letter (A–H) is spoken at the same time.

Your goal: press ‘A’ if the position matches the one N steps back, press ‘L’ if the letter matches, and press ‘Both’ (or the spacebar) if both match.

item.title: Sequential Memory Training Game
item.description:
How to Play

  1. Memorize: Watch symbols appear in numbered order (#1, #2, #3…)
  2. Recall: Click cards in the same numbered order
  3. Improve: Track your score and accuracy as you progress

Why It Works

Sequential memory training strengthens your brain’s ability to:

  • Remember multi-step instructions
  • Follow procedures in correct order
  • Improve working memory capacity

Tips for Success

  • Create associations: Link numbers to symbols (#1⭐ = “One star”)
  • Make stories: Create a narrative with symbols in order
  • Practice daily: Short, consistent sessions work best
  • Progress gradually: Start with 4 items, advance when ready

Difficulty Levels

Level Items Time
Beginner 4 10s
Intermediate 6 12s
Advanced 8 15s
Expert 10 18s

Train 5-10 minutes daily for best results.
